benchmark_details.name: WoS Expanded Datasets for Scientific Text Classification
benchmark_details.overview: The paper introduces three new expanded datasets (WoS-53949, WoS-18932, WoS-8716) for scientific text classification, generated through targeted queries on the Web of Science database to enhance model performance through dataset augmentation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To improve the performance of scientific text classification through dataset expansion and fine-tuning of pre-trained language models.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Some domains with sparse data posed challenges in achieving balanced performance.

data.annotation: Predicted labels using a hard-voting strategy combined with fine-tuned PLMs.

methodology.calculation: Micro F1 Score computed based on model predictions against true labels.
methodology.interpretation: Higher Micro F1 Scores indicate better classification accuracy and model performance.
methodology.baseline_results: BERT achieved a Micro F1 Score of 0.8788 on WoS-53949 dataset.
methodology.validation: Dynamic learning rate adjustment and early stopping were employed to optimize training.
